A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm Star Wars' number one fan and I don't wan't to even say this but this film was the worst in the franchise\, I wanted to like it... But it just left me kind of angry. The reason I'm not writing a passionate\, long\, angry review is because a lot of other fans agree with me. Sadly this is a huge let down and I really don't even care about  episode 9. Sure I'm going to see it opening day (mostly because Daisy Ridley is my new Hollywood crush\, then again that might change in a couple years\, never mind this is beside the point) but all I'm all I'm unamused and disappointed in the sloppy writing and delivery of this film.
